text: In the final scenes of Chris Brown : Welcome to My Life, a 2017 documentary about the R & B singer, Brown exits a Los Angeles courthouse. It is March of 2015 and a judge has just ended Brown ’ s six - year probation. The artist – his hot pink hair serving as a pop star counterbalance to his tailored suit – is thrilled. “ No more problems. No issues. Nothing. We ’ re great, ” Brown says to the camera while a van carries him away from the courthouse. “ I don ’ t even know what to say right now.
